message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. It's a great value considering its worth of $120 to other potential buyers and its value to you is $100. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits of the product while allowing you to acquire it at a reasonable cost. Looking forward to your response!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've highlighted, $110 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. This price is fair considering my maximum budget and the product's worth to me. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I am willing to accept $105 for the product. I believe this price is beneficial for both parties and ensures a fair transaction. Please let me know if this works for you.
